question: Write an SQL query to select all records from a table named 'students'.
description: Retrieve all rows from the 'students' table.

question: Write an SQL query to insert a new student with name 'Karan' and age 24 into the students table.
description: Insert a new row into the 'students' table with name 'Karan' and age 24.

question: Write an SQL query to update the age of the student named 'Amit' to 19.
description: Update the age of the student named 'Amit' to 19.

question: Write an SQL query to delete the student named 'Sita'.
description: Delete the record of the student named 'Sita'.

question: Write an SQL query to select all students whose age is greater than 20.
description: Select all students strictly older than 20 years.

question:
Student Age Analysis

The school principal wants a list of students who are eligible for the senior sports team. Eligibility criteria: Age must be 22 or older.


Schema:

  • id (Integer): Unique ID
  • name (Text): Student Name
  • age (Integer): Student Age
description: Retrieve all students composed of those aged 22 or older for the sports team.
